org.ardenus.utils

Class Program

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.utils.Program

  • public final class Program
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to get information and manage the main program that is currently running.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirivs" Summerlin

    • Method Detail

      • getArguments

        public static java.lang.String[] getArguments(java.lang.String... keyValues)
        Parameters:
        keyValues - the arguments for the program, with the pattern being the argument key and then the value.
        Returns:
        the arguments in the Ardenus Engine startup argument format.

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        Restarts the application.

      • getArchitecture

        public static int getArchitecture()
        Returns:
        the program architecture as either 32-bit or 64-bit.

      • getRunningFile

        public static java.io.File getRunningFile()
        Returns:
        the currently running JAR file, or null if the application is not being run from a JAR.

      • getRunningLocation

        public static java.io.File getRunningLocation()
        Returns:
        the location the program is being run at.
